alert.note: Alert for Christian; Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 8:11PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHWESTERN SANGAMON COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 811 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Virden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chatham, Auburn, Rochester, Pawnee, Divernon, Loami, Thayer, Glenarm, and Lowder. This includes Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 91. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
